name: shed-shell
effect: Held: The holder is unaffected by any moves or abilities that would prevent it from actively leaving battle.
short_effect: Held: Holder can bypass all trapping effects and switch out. Multi-turn moves still cannot be switched out of.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.
